DaySkipper.text: Do NOT set current time between daylight saving (1am - 3am)
Goto Pokemon Center to prevent crash
Hover cursor on Date and Time
Plug the Arduino/Teensy to the Switch

DaySkipper_Unlimited.text: Set current date to 1st of any month with 31 days
Goto Pokemon Center to prevent crash
Hover cursor on Date and Time
Plug the Arduino/Teensy to the Switch

WattFarmer.text: Stand in front of a wishing piece den

FriendDeleteAdd.text: Hover cursor on the last friend
Plug the Arduino/Teensy to the Switch

BerryFarmer.text: Stand in front of a berry tree
Stay away from wild pokemon that can run into you

AutoLoto.text: Stand in front of Rotom PC

BoxRelease.text: Set text speed to Fast, save game first
All release boxes are adjacent to each other
All release boxes don't have any eggs and completely filled
Move cursor to leftmost box's top left corner

AutoFossil.text: Set Send to Boxes to Automatic, Give Nicknames to Don't give
Set Sound Effects volume to 0 (Require Hi-tech Earbuds)
Set text speed to Fast, save in front of Cara Liss
Fossil pokemon already registered in the Pokedex
Talk to Cara Liss to check the slot for each fossil
Have enough number for both fossils

AutoFossil_GR.text: Set Send to Boxes to Automatic, Give Nicknames to Don't give
Set Sound Effects volume to 0 (Require Hi-tech Earbuds)
Set text speed to Fast, save in front of Cara Liss
Fossil pokemon already registered in the Pokedex
Talk to Cara Liss to check the slot for each fossil
Have enough number for both fossils

Auto3DaySkipper.text: Collect watts of a wishing piece den and save

BoxSurpriseTrade.text: Goto any places that is not Wild Area (reduce lag)
Don't stand in front of any NPCs
All trade boxes are adjacent to each other
All trade boxes don't have any eggs, empty spaces are fine
Goto PC and scroll to the leftmost box then exit

AutoHost.text: Collect watts of a wishing piece den and save
(Optional) Skipping 3 days require system time unsynced

EggCollector.text: Set Send to Box to Automatic in Options
Have plenty of space in your PC
Have a full party without any eggs, collected eggs will goto box
Have a fully upgraded Rotom Bike (use WattFarmer)
Goto Route 5 Nursery and charge up Rotom Bike turbo boost
Cycle to the left side of the Nursery worker, facing North-East
(Optional) Defeat GAME FREAK's Morimoto to get Oval Charm
(Optional) Pokemon in Nursery have different trainer ID

EggCollector_IT.text: Set Send to Box to Automatic in Options
Have plenty of space in your PC
Have a full party without any eggs, collected eggs will goto box
Have a fully upgraded Rotom Bike (use WattFarmer)
Goto Route 5 Nursery and charge up Rotom Bike turbo boost
Cycle to the left side of the Nursery worker, facing North-East
(Optional) Defeat GAME FREAK's Morimoto to get Oval Charm
(Optional) Pokemon in Nursery have different trainer ID

EggHatcher.text: Set Give Nicknames to Don't give in Options
Have only one pokemon with Flame Body in your party
Have the hatching pokemon already registered in the Pokedex
Have a fully upgraded Rotom Bike (use WattFarmer)
Goto Route 5 Nursery and charge up Rotom Bike turbo boost
From nursery, cycle south west until you hit the NPC on the bridge
All columns of hatching eggs in PC must be adjacent to each other
Each column must have 5 eggs, except the rightmost (last) column
All eggs must be in the same egg cycle group
Move the cursor to the top left of the leftmost box (first column)
Press Y to change the cursor to Multiselect mode (Green)

AutoBattleTower.text: Set text speed to Fast and Battle Effects to Off
Rent team "0000-0006-15Y4-3R" at VS Battle Stadium (Team detail in Manual)
Join Single Battle on Battle Tower, wait until you can press Fight

AutoTournament.text: Set text speed to Fast and Battle Effects to Off
Use ONLY Zacian and with ONLY Max PP Up Behemoth Blade (Iron Head)
(Optional) Use ONLY one Pokemon from recommended list (check Manual)
(Optional) Level up to 100, max IV and EV train the Pokemon you bring
Stand in front of Wyndon Stadium receptionist

GodEggDuplication.text: Set Send to Box to Manual in Options
Have a full party without any eggs, put target Pokemon on top slot
Have a fully upgraded Rotom Bike (use WattFarmer)
Put god egg and a Ditto in Route 5 Nursery
Charge up Rotom Bike turbo boost
Cycle to the left side of the Nursery worker, facing North-East
(Optional) Defeat GAME FREAK's Morimoto to get Oval Charm
(Optional) Pokemon in Nursery have different trainer ID

PurpleBeamFinder.text: Have at least one wishing piece
Ride on a bike in front of an empty den (with watts collected) and save

ShinyFiveRegi.text: Set text speed to Fast and Battle Effects to Off
First Pokemon must be able to run away from battle (or hold Smoke Bomb)
Rock/Ice/Steel: Walk straight to the statue without lighting up any spots
Eleki/Drago: Enter a battle with the Regi and run
FAST MODE: First Pokemon MUST NOT be shiny/have a showable ability/high happiness

ShinySwordTrio.text: Set text speed to Fast and Battle Effects to Off
First Pokemon must be able to run away from battle (or hold Smoke Bomb)
Run into the trio Pokemon and run
Stand on the spot where the trio spawns (Slow/Fast mode only: start camping)
FAST MODE: First Pokemon MUST NOT be shiny/have a showable ability
FAST MODE: ALL Pokemon in the team MUST NOT have high happiness
FAST MODE: Weather must be CLEAR, not Sunny, Snowing, Raining etc.
SHINY AWARE MODE: No following Pokemon, avatar facing up

DailyHighlightFarmer.text: Stand in front of Watt Trader at Snowslide Slope

ShinyRegigigas.text: Set text speed to Fast and Battle Effects to Off
Bring all 5 Regis with you in your team
Stand in front of Regigigas den in Giant's Bed and save
SOFT RESET MODE: No extra requirement
SHINY AWARE MODE: First Pokemon has Reversal to OHKO Regigigas (check Manual)
SHINY AWARE MODE: Reversal move of first Pokemon must have at least 10 PP
SHINY AWARE MODE: Navigate to beg and hover to Leppa Berry then leave
SHINY AWARE MODE: Win the raid manually at least once before starting

BDSP_ResetDialgaPalkia.text: Set text speed to Fast and Battle Effects to Off

BDSP_ResetStarter.text: Set text speed to Fast and Battle Effects to Off
Save just before entering Lake Verity

BDSP_MenuGlitch113.text: Go to HM list in Poketch, move cursor to Fly and minimize
Go to Route 211 to the left of Celestic Town
Stand to the left of the pushable boulder

BDSP_BoxDuplication.text: Go to the box you want to duplicate
Make sure there's a Pokemon or Egg at the top left
Make sure boxes to the right are empty

BDSP_BoxOperation.text: Make sure all boxes are full of Pokemon (30)

BDSP_ResetLegendary.text: Set text speed to Fast and Battle Effects to Off
Save in front of the Legendary

BDSP_ResetShaymin.text: Set text speed to Fast and Battle Effects to Off
Use D-Pad to move in front of Shaymin
Have only Bike registered, have it set on fast mode
First Pokemon MUST have max happiness and no popup ability

PLA_ResetAlphaGallade.text: Head back to Jubilife Village to reset RNG seeds
Go to the roof of the bottom entrance of Snowpoint Temple
Get on Braviary, use Y,Plus,A to gain height to get to top entrance
Save in front of the top entrance

PLA_ResetAlphaCrobat.text: Head back to Jubilife Village to reset RNG seeds
Go to the north entrance of Wayward Cave
Save in front of the entrance

SV_ItemDuplication.text: Put cloned Koraidon/Miraidon to 2nd slot of the team
Add item to clone to Koraidon/Miraidon
Save game, move cursor to 2nd slot pokemon

SV_EggCollector.text: Turn off Autosave, Text Speed to Fast
Have only 2 pokemon to breed in your team
Save game and start a picnic on a flat surface
Move to on top of egg basket, facing picnic table and reset camera
Find the location of Great PenutButter Sandwich (top left is 0,0)

SV_EggHatcher.text: Turn off Autosave, Text Speed to Fast, Turn off Give Nicknames
Have only a Flame Body pokemon in your party with an attacking move
Have the hatching pokemon already registered in the Pokedex
Go to the top of Poco Path lighthouse
Get on ride pokemon, hold right to move along the edge for one loop
Save game, go to Boxes, sort eggs column by column from left to right
All eggs must be in the same egg cycle group
Move the cursor to the top left of the leftmost box (first column)

SV_BoxRelease.text: Turn off Autosave, Text Speed to Fast
Go to Boxes, sort pokemon from left to right, top to bottom
Move cursor to the top left pokemon, save game

SV_GimmighoulFarmer.text: Turn off Autosave, Text Speed to Fast
Stand in front of a Gimmighoul in a Pokemon Center
Talk to it to get its coin and save game
